description: inro  olive wood with carp trimmed in gold leaf; eye inlaid yellow sheep horn; ojime  carp ascending waterfall; oosick with inlaid ox horn eyes; netsuke  carp changing into a dragon; ivory inlaid eyes (red coral and umimatsu); pieces attached by red cord
dimension: a,b (inro): H.2-7/8 x W.3 in. (overall); c (ojime): H.1 x W.11/16 in.; d (netsuke): H.2-3/4 x W.2-1/8 in.
title: Fish Inro, en suite
